name: Maximum Chlorophyll Index (MCI) for Sentinel-2 L2A

inputs.name: Area of interest
inputs.description: The area of interest in geographic coordinates using decimal degree units

inputs.name: Spatial resolution
inputs.description: Size of a pixel in decimal degrees

inputs.name: Output name
inputs.description: A unique name for the output so it can later be identified, should include a slash-separated prefix, e.g. 'john_doe/S2L2A_SUBSET_1.zarr'

inputs.name: Output S3 endpoint URL
inputs.description: Endpoint URL of a S3-compatible object storage. Leave empty for default target in AWS S3.

inputs.name: Output S3 bucket
inputs.description: Name of a bucket in S3-compatible object storage. Leave empty for default target in AWS S3.

inputs.name: Output S3 region
inputs.description: Region identifier for S3-compatible object storage, e.g. 'eu-central-1'. Leave empty for default target in AWS S3.

inputs.name: Output S3 access key identifier
inputs.description: Your access key identifier. Leave empty for publicly writable buckets and for default target in AWS S3.

inputs.name: Output S3 secret access key
inputs.description: Your secret access key. Leave empty for publicly writable buckets and for default target in AWS S3.
